casebody.data:
Donald SOSNOWSKI, an individual; and Dawn Curcio Sosnowski, an individual, Petitioners,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable William D. Kephart, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Alan N. Ariav, an individual, Real Party in Interest. No. 75496 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MAY 15, 2018

DENIED.
